document.docAuthor: Glowska, Eliza, Chrzanowski, Mateusz & Kaszewska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dissonus Skoracki, 1999 : 155
(preoc.);
Neoaulonastus Skoracki, 2004 : 445
. Type-species:
Syringophilus bisetatus
Fritsch, 1958
, by original designation.

aegithalos Skoracki, 2011 : 122
, fig. 87 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 112 ), paratypes : females at AMU , ZISP .

Hosts and distribution.
Aegithalos caudatus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Aegithalidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Opolskie, Turawa Lake (Skoracki 2011 b).
Habitat. Rectrice feathers.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
apalis Klimovičová, Mikula,
Kahure and Hromada, 2014
: 573
, fig. 1 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 474 ), paratypes : females at AMU , LMEE . Hosts and distribution.
Apalis porphyrolaema
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Cisticolidae ), type locality: KENYA , Nyandarua (Klimovičová et al . 2014 a).

subSubSection.paragraph: Habitat. Unknown.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
bisetatus (
Fritsch, 1958
)
,
Syringophilus bisetatus
Fritsch, 1958
: 238
, fig. 7 ;
Dissonus scirpaceus , Skoracki 1999 : 157
, figs. 1–6 ;
Neoaulonastus bisetatus, Skoracki 2011 : 113
, figs. 80–82 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Lost (Skoracki 2011 b).

caligatus Skoracki, 2011 : 120
, figs. 85, 86 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 240 ). Hosts and distribution.
Iduna caligata
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Acrocephalidae ), type-locality: EUROPE (Skoracki 2011 b).
Habitat. Body feathers.

Type material.
Holotype female at UMMZ ( BMOC 81 -0728- 2 ), paratypes : females, males at UMMZ . Hosts and distribution.
Chrysocolaptes lucidus
( type host) ( Piciformes : Picidae ), type-locality: PHILIPPINES , Luzon Isl., Cagayan Prov., Pinablanca Munic between Bagio and Iland Rivers (
Skoracki & OConnor 2010
). Habitat. Unknown.

cinnyris
Klimovičová, Smolak, Njoroge and Hromada, 2014
: 256 , fig. 1 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 501 ), paratypes : females at AMU and NMK . Hosts and distribution.
Cinnyris mediocris
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Nectariniidae ), type locality: TANZANIA , Magamba (
Klimovičová et al. 2014 c
).
Habitat. Secondary and wings covert feathers.

granatina
Skoracki, Hromada and Unsoeld, 2013
: 372 , figs. 6, 7 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (ZMZ 60.1947), paratypes : females, males, protonymphs, tritonymph at AMU , ZSM .
Habitat. Body feathers.

grewlingi Glowska, 2013 : 20
, figs. 1–4 .

Type material.
Holotype female at ZMH , paratypes : females at ZMH . Hosts and distribution.
Falcunculus frontatus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Falcunculidae ), type-locality: AUSTRALIA , Brooking Springs (Glowska 2013 ).
Habitat. Unknown.

picidus Skoracki, 2011 : 124
, figs. 88, 89 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 241 ), paratypes : females at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Picus canus
( type host) ( Piciformes : Picidae ), type-locality: SLOVAKIA , Bardejov (Skoracki 2011 b);
Dendrocopos leucotos
( Picidae ), SLOVAKIA , Valkov, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2011 b);
D. major
( Picidae ), POLAND , Zachodniopomorskie, Darlowko Wschodnie, Bukowo-Kopan, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2011 b). Habitat. Covert and body feathers.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
quelea
Skoracki, Hromada and Unsoeld, 2013
: 372
, figs. 4, 5 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 386 ), paratypes : males, tritonymphs, protonymphs at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Quelea quelea
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Ploceidae ), type-locality: TANZANIA , Arusha, Usa-River (
Skoracki et al . 2013 a
).
Habitat. Body feathers.

remizus Skoracki, 2011 : 117
, figs. 83, 84 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 239 ), paratype : male at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Remiz pendulinus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Remizidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Opolskie, Turawa Lake (Skoracki 2011 b).
Habitat. Secondary feathers.

riparius Skoracki, 2011 : 126
, figs. 90, 91 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 246 ), paratypes : females at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Riparia riparia
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Hirundinidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Wielkopolska, Katy (Skoracki 2011 b).
Habitat. Secondary feathers.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
tanzanicus
Skoracki, Hromada and Unsoeld, 2013
: 369
, figs. 2, 3 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 385 ), paratypes : females, male, tritonymph, protonymphs at AMU , ZSM .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts and distribution.
Euplectes axillaris
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Ploceidae ), type-locality: TANZANIA , Arusha, Usa-River (
Skoracki et al . 2013 a
).
Habitat. Body feathers.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
zosterops
Skoracki, Antczak and Riegert, 2009
: 129
, figs. 8–12 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females, nymphs at AMU , ZISP , MRAC . Hosts and distribution.
Zosterops senegalensis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Zosteropidae ), type-locality: CAMEROON (Skoracki et al. 2009 a);
Zosterops erythropleurus
( Zosteropidae ), RUSSIA , Primorsky Krai, Partizanskii District, Novolitovsk, ( ZISP , AMU ) (Skoracki & Mironov 2013 ).
Habitat. Secondary feathers.
